review:
Service was excellent, I highly recommend Khushbu for all your tooth problems. 
The surgeon did an excellent job with my wisdom tooth removal.

I’ve got my tooth scaling also done which was done very well. I’m so happy with the service. Thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My experience was awesome. Dr. Shah did a careful examination, explained all possible treatments and did a very wonderful job. I am a regular at her clinic now for any dental issues. 
The clinic is clean, hygienic and Dr. Shah takes care of her patients really well. What's more? It's budget friendly. 
I would definitely recommend Dr. Shah.

review: Went to extract my half broken tooth, removed it easily. Khushbu suggested for bridging. I already had one tooth pulled out with this two tooth’s.  Was hesitant to go for the bridging but after discussing with Khushbu and the benefits of the bridging, I went ahead.  It took me 4 to 5 visits because she want the bridging to be perfect and she took care of me pretty well.  I would recommend her for all dentist issues. Best part is she does the treatment by herself.
